A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TERRIBLE MOVIE! Heartbreakingly bad. If you want to see your favourite childhood movie characters desecrated and ridiculed\, then go and watch this steaming turd of a movie. Messy\, confusing\, long and boring with so many cringe moments it's hard to pick anything redeemable about it. Looks good though as it's had so much money shoved up its backside. Avoid this movie if you want to keep your good memories of Star Wars.
